original_title: オジさんのボクがシェアハウスの女性7人に媚薬を飲ませたら超淫乱女子に大変身！チ○ポを求められまくる大ハーレム状態に！もういい年のオジさんなのに子供どころか彼女もおらず一人暮らし歴20年強。一緒に暮らす家族もできないので、出会いを求めて若い女子たちと一つ…
overview: Even though she is a good old man, she doesn't have a daughter-in-law and a child, and when she moves into a share house in search of encounters, all the girls are full of cute children! Life like a dream! When I thought about it, I couldn't keep up with the topic of young people and was isolated ... In a blink of an eye, I got estrus and suddenly changed into a nasty looking for Ji Po! From a hated person to a big harem state!
tagline: I'm A Dirty Old Man, But I Don't Even Have Kids or A Girlfriend, and I've Been Living Alone Now for 20 Years Since I Don't Have A Family to Live with Me, I Sought Out the Classifieds and Found These Young Girls...
title: I'm A Dirty Old Man, and When I Drugged These 7 Ladies Living in A Shared Living House, They Transformed Into Horny Sluts! It Was Like A Harlem, Because They Were All Cumming for My Cock!
